modules.name: Blossom
modules.description: Generates a pair of complex, pulsing LFO signals

modules.name: Cubic
modules.description: Offsets, scales, squares, and cubes its input signal

modules.name: Func
modules.description: A knob with a selectable range to offset or scale its input signal

modules.name: Func 6
modules.description: A chain of knobs with selectable ranges to offset and scale input signals

modules.name: Gator
modules.description: Computes eight common logic functions for up to 16 inputs

modules.name: Hostage
modules.description: Generates a hold or sustain envelope stage

modules.name: Ranger
modules.description: A modulatable knob with an adjustable, modulatable range

modules.name: Swave
modules.description: A waveshaper with a unique sigmoid transfer function

modules.name: Tapers
modules.description: A pair of modulatable knobs with adjustable, modulatable tapers

modules.name: Xycloid
modules.description: Generates a pair of complex, pulsing LFO signals
